name: Space Raider (Yatchan)
description:
40 years have passed since your famous raid over the endless river. You thought you would never have to face countless enemies again. However, your skills are needed once more! Technology has advanced and now space is the battlefield. How far will you be able to proceed this time?

For those, who are old enough - it's good old River Raid with space theme. Features randomly generated levels - you can choose the seed to produce the layout you like.

On the web version you have to press ESC two times to return to the title screen.
